text: U Musa (ji Xudaye xwe aha) dilxwezi xwestiye:" Xudaye me! Bi rasti te ji bona Firâ€™ewn u koma wi ra di jina cihane da xisir u maldaryeke pir daye. Xudaye me! Qey evan (dayine hane, ku te daye wan) ji bona ku ewan ji reya te derkebin u reya te wunda bikin, te daye wan? Xudaye me! Tu male wan rasihetine u deriz bike u tu dile wan zor teng bike, idi heya ewan sapata dilsoz nebinin, ewan bawer nakin
